title: Backgroud patching?
body:
I was wondering if there is any way to have background patches setup?
So i can just leave my PC on client open/Minimized to tray and once the patch go's live have it start downloading in the background. So It's all shiny and up to date when I launch it.
____
Or if you can advise a time when you know that patch is up I could use a scheduled task :) 
Would 5am morning after patch night be about right? 
____

replies.body:
From my knowledge (very well may be wrong) but shortly after the servers go down, the patch is actually set to go, the reason patches take so long is sorting out their servers with the info (which they can't do until servers are down.)

So it should be from the 5am down time (might take a while to be setup or something who knows)

Be great if a red could confirm/deny this though.
